text: Arthur Robert Hart (22 June 1917 – 16 October 1981) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Fitzroy Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Two of his brothers, Eddie Hart, and Don Hart also played for Fitzroy. == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1917 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Arthur Hart (footballer, born 1917)
